meanings.definition: To design or make in a particular form or style.
meanings.sent1: She likes to stylize her drawings with colorful patterns.
meanings.sent2: The artist chose to stylize the painting with bold brush strokes.
meanings.sent3: Trying to stylize a stick figure into a masterpiece was a fun challenge.
meanings.sent4: Her unique way to stylize reality turned the mundane into magic.
meanings.sent5: The fashion designer's ability to stylize outfits made her creations unforgettable.

meanings.definition: To give a particular style to.
meanings.sent1: He wanted to stylize his room with a vintage theme.
meanings.sent2: The interior decorator decided to stylize the living room with modern furniture.
meanings.sent3: Attempting to stylize a pet's wardrobe led to some hilarious fashion choices.
meanings.sent4: The chef's innovative plating techniques stylize each dish like a work of art.
meanings.sent5: The hairstylist's skill to stylize hairdos transformed ordinary looks into extraordinary ones.
